XIII.i.5.B.3.c
.
No Current Examination Used in the Memorandum VR&EÂ Rating Decision
When preparing a memorandum VR&E rating decision, if entitlement is established without a current examination, note that fact for the benefit of the VR&E counselor or counseling psychologist.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B - Memorandum Vocational Rehabilitation/Employment (VR&E) Ratings
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B
